problem_names: lemma vars_mset_subst_db: "vars_mset (subst_db i x s) = {#y \<in># vars_mset s. y \<noteq> x#}"
lemma head_subst_db: "head (subst_db i x s) = head (subst (raw_db_subst i x) s)"

lemma args_subst_db:
  "args (subst_db i x s) = map (subst_db (if head s = Sym lam then i + 1 else i) x) (args s)"

lemma var_mset_subst_db_subseteq:
  "vars_mset s \<subseteq># vars_mset t \<Longrightarrow> vars_mset (subst_db i x s) \<subseteq># vars_mset (subst_db i x t)"
translations: lemma vars_mset_subst_db: "vars_mset (subst_db i x s) = {#y \<in># vars_mset s. y \<noteq> x#}"
by (induct s arbitrary: i) (auto elim: hd.set_cases)
lemma head_subst_db: "head (subst_db i x s) = head (subst (raw_db_subst i x) s)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. head (subst_db i x s) = head (subst (raw_db_subst i x) s)
by (induct s arbitrary: i) (auto simp: raw_db_subst_def split: hd.split)

lemma args_subst_db:
  "args (subst_db i x s) = map (subst_db (if head s = Sym lam then i + 1 else i) x) (args s)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. args (subst_db i x s) =
    map (subst_db (if head s = Sym lam then i + 1 else i) x) (args s)

lemma var_mset_subst_db_subseteq:
  "vars_mset s \<subseteq># vars_mset t \<Longrightarrow> vars_mset (subst_db i x s) \<subseteq># vars_mset (subst_db i x t)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vars_mset s \<subseteq># vars_mset t \<Longrightarrow>
    vars_mset (subst_db i x s) \<subseteq># vars_mset (subst_db i x t)
